item.title: Rep. Tenney to Newsmax: DHS Funding Fight a Democrat 'Stunt'
item.description: Rep. Claudia Tenney, R-N.Y., accused Democrats in Congress of engaging in political "showboating" as a shutdown deadline looms.

item.title: Rep. Randy Fine to Newsmax: Shutdown 'for Sure' as Funding Deadline Hits
item.description: A federal government shutdown is inevitable as Congress races toward a midnight funding deadline, according to Rep. Randy Fine on Newsmax Friday.
